work.name: The Brain Cognition and Brain Disease Institute, Chinese Academy of Sciences
work.summary: Leading pretraining of foundation models for neuronal circuit analysis and developing a deep learning pipeline for stitching 3D brain slices.

work.name: Natural Language Processing Lab, Tsinghua University
work.summary: Contributed to large language model research, including the development of an open book QA system and UltraLM, BMTools, and GPT-World.

work.name: Zealen Technology
work.summary: Led training of Vision Transformer on wind power prediction task, achieving competitive performance with industry standards.

work.name: Shenzhen Research Institute of Big Data
work.summary: Participated in the full-stack development of various projects including a funding approval system, a campus heatmap service, and a fire probability warning system.

education.institution: The Chinese University of Hong Kong, Shenzhen
